III.i.1.A.3.c
.
Qualifying Coast Guard Reserve Service Under 14 U.S.C.
Activation of a Coast Guard Reservist under 14 U.S.C. qualifies as active service for VA purposes.
Reference
:Â  For more information on activation of a Coast Guard Reservist, see
14 U.S.C. 3705
14 U.S.C. 3713
, and
38 U.S.C. 101(10), (21), and (24)
.
title: M21-1, Part III, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section A - Establishing Veteran Status
citation: Part III, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section A
